content: this is my simple all in one stegosaurus dinosaur pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts depending on your skill level it takes about 20-30 minutes to complete one dinosaur it uses approx 14 metres 15 yards of yarn each with a 3 5mm hook two different colours of yarn are used one for the body and one for the spikes with this particular pattern you can use either 6mm safety eyes or sew eyes on later with black yarn great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too also please do not upload the pattern into facebook group files without permission if you could just share a link to this page that would be great thank you please see my other all in one patterns
